name: Meme Hunt - "MLG edition"
description:
A new MLG game for the best quickscopers out there!

When I say BOOM BOOM BOOM then you say WAYO HARDSCOPER lel it's MEME HUNT.

Prove that you can do trickshot mid-air no-scope only now and join yoloswagclub or get rekt m8

Become an AIMBOT MASTER without auto aim in CoD))))) L@L

Our official website: http://mlgflappybird420.com/
